summary: A visual montage portrait of our contemporary world dominated by globalized technology and violence.
cast: Belladonna|Marlon Brando|Elton John|Julia Louis-Dreyfus|Madonna|Bhagwan Mirchandani|Jack Shamblin|Steven Soderbergh|Troy Aikman|The Beatles|Osama bin Laden|Fidel Castro|Warren Christopher|Bill Clinton|The Dalai Lama|Thomas A. Edison|Albert Einstein|Adolf Hitler|Nikita Khrushchev|Martin Luther King|Henry Kissinger|V.I. Lenin|Greg Louganis|Jeff Maksym|Zedong Mao|Pope John Paul II|Ronald Reagan|Jimmy Swaggart
title: Naqoyqatsi
